name: Adventure Boy Jailbreak
description:
Puzzle your way through the small town of Estivale, brought to life with a range of characters who all have their own problem to solve. With each person you help, Benson gets one stop closer to breaking his friend Mike out of the county jail. This game was made by just one person, and stands as the debut title from Eyeball2D.
Adventure Boy Jailbreak is a swap-quest adventure game, with logic puzzles and humorous dialogue. A huge cast of funny, weird and thoughtful characters await, as you collect and trade items to guide Benson, the wise-cracking teen on a mission to rescue his friend.
